decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (S2818/SLP, S2818/02, Unnumbered Design & Access Statement, received 14/08/2013, Email from Gareth Bridge, received 09/10/2013, S2818/11B, S2818/12C, S2818/01A,  received 30/09/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - Not more than one boat shall be moored at the jetty and shall only be used for private recreational purposes for the enjoyment of the occupiers of 64 Chiswick Staithe and shall not be used for commercial purposes or as a houseboat unless prior written approval is granted by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - The proposed deck area is to be used solely for the purpose of accessing a vessel moored at the site. The jetty shall not be used as an amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - No external lighting is to be installed on any part of the timber jetty unless prior written approval is granted by the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a timber jetty to the rear of the property
